column2:
ggplot(os_fore[model %in% c('local_trend', 'lt_arma_gibbs', 'local_level')], aes(no, rmse)) +
    geom_point() +
    geom_line() +
    geom_line(aes(y = total_rmse), col = 'blue') + 
    facet_wrap(~model, nrow = 1) +
    theme_bw() +
    ggtitle('Out-of-sample RMSE')
ggsave('../figs/out_os_sample_rmse.png')
